name: abandoned
description: long forgotten hotdog man, stalking the abandoned building
author: @hotdogmanisreal
special: special can focus without spending a turn

name: bedroom
description: hotdog man that slowly creeps towards you as you fall asleep
author: @hotdogmanisreal
special: special can heal 5-10 HP and deal 5 damage

name: comic
description: strong hotdog man straight from a handdrawn manga
author: @moontr3
special: special deals 5-10 damage every 3 turns without spending a turn

name: drawing
description: fanart of an mlg 2010 lookin hotdog man
author: @moontr3
special: special deals 10-30 damage every 3 turns, available after lv.5

name: evil
description: the evilest hotdog man known to man
author: @hotdogmanisreal
special: special deals base damage and heals 5-10 HP every 3 turns, available after lv.5

name: high-res
description: the original high-quality hotdog man art
author: alex callaway
special: special can focus every 3 turns without spending a turn, available after lv.10

name: mall
description: hotdog man going shopping in an abandoned mall
author: @hotdogmanisreal
special: special focuses and deals 10 damage every 3 turns

name: mickey mouse
description: mickey the mouse has become the hotdog man
author: @hotdogmanisreal
special: great stats overall, but no special available

name: mirror
description: a meme of hotdog man admiring himself in a mirror
author: @hotdogmanisreal
special: special can heal 5-8 HP without spending a turn, available after lv.5

name: og
description: the one and only og hotdog man that started it all
author: god knows who
special: special can deal 5 damage every 2 turns without spending a turn

name: old king
description: the great ruler of the hotdog man kingdom
author: @hotdogmanisreal
special: special can focus and heal 5 HP every 2 turns without spending a turn

name: on sale
description: hotdog man, a very cheap one at that
author: god knows who
special: special can heal 5-10 HP and focus every 3 turns

name: poster
description: the "you are what you eat" artwork by alex callaway
author: god knows who
special: special can deal either 5, 10 or 15 damage every 3 turns without spending a turn. available from lv.5

name: retro
description: hotdog man in a pixelated tv-screen retro world
author: @hotdogmanisreal
special: special can heal 2-15 HP every 2 turns without spending a turn

name: snowy type 1
description: hotdog man hidden behind the trees watching your window
author: @hotdogmanisreal
special: special can deal 5 damage every 2 turns without spending a turn

name: snowy type 2
description: you staring at the hotdog man ready to run
author: @hotdogmanisreal
special: special can heal 5 HP every 3 turns

name: street type 1
description: hotdog man is getting closer and closer to your home
author: @hotdogmanisreal
special: special can focus 2 times, available after lv.5

name: street type 2
description: he is watching your window in hopes of finding you
author: @hotdogmanisreal
special: special can focus 2 times, available after lv.5

name: twins
description: twin hotdog mans exploring an abandoned house
author: @hotdogmanisreal
special: special can force each twin to heal either 0 or 10 hp every 2 turns
